entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
